charinfo.name: Yuhi Kurenai
charinfo.description: The squad leader of Team 8, Kurenai is a caring woman and a close companion to Asuma. Kurenai is a genjutsu master, being able to use a variety of illusions to disrupt and trap her enemies in nigh impossible to escape illusions.

abilities.name: Demonic Illusion: Entrap
abilities.description: Kurenai hinders an enemy with her genjutsu, dealing 10 damage to them, making them unable to become invulnerable or reduce damage, reducing their non-affliction damage by 10, and increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Illusionary Tree Meld
abilities.description: Kurenai melds into an illusionary tree, gaining 10 destructible defense, and an additional 5 for each skill other than this skill Kurenai has used. The additional destructible defense will be reset when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death
abilities.description: Kurenai imprisons an enemy in a powerful genjutsu, stunning them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Tree Binding Death Attack'.

abilities.name: Tree Binding Death Attack
abilities.description: Attacking through her genjutsu, Kurenai deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy affected by 'Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death'

abilities.name: Vanishing Illusion
abilities.description: This skill makes Yuhi Kurenai invulnerable for 1 turn.
